tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE documents (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 title VARCHAR(255),
 content TEXT,
 created_by VARCHAR(50),
 created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  password TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
  collab_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id INTEGER REFERENCES documents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  permission_level INTEGER NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id INTEGER REFERENCES documents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  comment TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE edits (
  edit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doc_id INT,
  editor_id INT,
  edit_content TEXT NOT NULL,
  edit_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES documents(doc_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (editor_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doc_id INT,
  recipient_id INT,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  sent_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES documents(doc_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);
